column1: Kata Robata////This is my favorite sushi restaurant is Houston! The quality of their sushi is excellent and tastes very fresh
column2: and there are many entrees that combine unique flavors to create outstanding dishes. The drink menu is up to par with their food menu
column3: and their happy hour is one that is a must-try! This is an upscale restaurant
column4: but so worth the splurge if you afford it.
